cast.overview: When his wife doesn't want to talk to him because he cheated on her, a police officer hostages and shoots a colleague. Based on true events, witness how a marital problem leads to a tragic end.
cast.title: Sapul

cast.overview: A pastor's mistress and a delivery rider get engaged in a steamy affair. When their secrets are revealed, they have to face the consequences.
cast.title: Siklo

cast.overview: The friendship of two men is set on fire as one finds out that his wife is having a steamy affair with the other.
cast.title: Silab

cast.overview: A marine biologist tasked to rehabilitate a fish sanctuary, falls for Dennis, his diving assistant. The situation takes an unexpected turn when Jason's wife, Abby, finds out of the clandestine relationship between Jason and Dennis.
cast.title: Sisid

cast.overview: A lonely man meets a free-spirited woman, who teaches him nine steps in order to move on. As she helps him, they will start to fall for each other.
cast.title: Hilom

cast.overview: A nurse is assigned to work at an island called Isla Bato, where men treat women with lust. As she experiences the people's madness, she plans a way to get out of the island.
cast.title: Island of Desire

cast.overview: Story of Eunice aka Moonlight Butterfly, the hottest GRO in Angeles, Pampanga and the three men in her life. She soon learns to play the game of lust and love in order to survive and provide for her family.
cast.title: Moonlight Butterfly

cast.overview: Desire and her boyfriend, Adam, stay at her sister's house while they are on vacation. Things turn chaotic when a mysterious man intrudes the house and rapes her.
cast.title: Manyak

cast.overview: A young couple's sex acts are witnessed by a young man through a hole. When the wife seduces him, they engage in an illicit affair. Chaos ensues when the husband learns about them.
cast.title: Scorpio Nights 3

cast.overview: An author, whose marriage is on the rocks, meets his literary idol, his neighbor. He soon begins to have an affair with his idol's daughter. But when their secret is discovered, more revelations are yet to explode.
cast.title: Beyond the Sky

cast.overview: Janice's steamy obsession to imitate Lexi propels them to campus stardom. But dark secrets blur the lines between authenticity and seductive deception.
cast.title: Bedspacer

cast.overview: A security guard is charmed by a hot tenant he calls Ms. F. His sexual fantasy will take him to the extreme that will change his and his wife's lives forever.
cast.title: Relyebo

cast.overview: Rita, who finds herself alone when husband Ariel works abroad. They both find solace and sexual satisfaction in other people. When Ariel comes back, they both act like nothing happened. But will this keep their marriage from falling apart?
cast.title: Rita

cast.overview: In a party arranged by friends, Rachel meets four men. The night full of booze and drugs turns chaotic when the men rape Rachel and her friends. Rachel vows to seek vengeance no matter what it takes.
cast.title: Nightbird

cast.overview: When the brutal murder of a teenage girl devastates his sleepy town, a troubled police officer begins an investigation that tests his limits.
cast.title: Red

cast.overview: A talented mechanic and driver, Migs quickly finds success when a customer he likes, Gabbi, leads him into the life of street car racing. But as he goes along this life and learns of Gabbi’s past, Migs makes rash decisions that might put the brakes on their relationship.
cast.title: Kaskasero

cast.overview: An edgy sexy thriller about an innocent college boy and the woman who would introduce him to manhood. Alex meets his new sultry neighbor, Rose, who awakens his sexual desire and gives him his first sexual experience only to learn a trap awaits him.
cast.title: The Neighbor

cast.overview: An alluring dance instructor chooses Rey, a rich businessman, over Lukas, her dance partner. But when Lukas feels something is off, he knows L is in grave danger.
cast.title: Salsa Ni L

cast.overview: Set in the Philippines during the 1940's, Celestina is a story about a woman, a burlesk dancer, who struggles to provide for her family while her husband is a gambling and womanizing drunkard. Despite the hardships, Celestina perseveres and finds strength in her love for her son.
cast.title: Celestina: Burlesk Dancer

cast.overview: Set in 1944, Victoria, who escapes captivity as a comfort woman, finds refuge, and love, with the man Selina left in the first movie.
cast.title: Victoria's Silver

cast.overview: Details Here
cast.title: Balahibong Pusa

cast.overview: A group of friends sets out on a thrilling trip to Vietnam, but their adventure turns dangerous when one of them is found dead, sparking suspense, secrets, and unexpected tension.
cast.title: Sem Break
